mistakes.tense misused: Past continuous tense should be used instead of present perfect continuous tense
Past simple tense should be used instead of present continuous tense

User1s Name.most_troublesome_area: Tense usage, particularly between past continuous and present perfect continuous

mistakes.tense misused: The contraction 'lets' should be used to match the informal tone of the conversation
The context suggests a current or ongoing action, so 'start our standup' should be in present tense

User2s Name.most_troublesome_area: Consistency in contractions and tense usage
